content:
Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "written_book", "quantity": 13, "index": 14}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 57, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft oak planks, I need to move a stripped oak log into the crafting grid. Since the crafting grid is currently empty, I can move the stripped oak log from slot 36 to any slot in the crafting grid (eg., slot 1).
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 13, "index": 14}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 57, "index": 29}]
thought: I have now crafted oak planks in the crafting slot, so I will move them to an empty slot (eg., slot 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 13, "index": 14}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 57, "index": 29}]
thought: To craft an oak button, I need to place an oak plank in any slot of the crafting grid. The nearest oak plank is at index 11, so I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 13, "index": 14}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 57, "index": 29}]
thought: I have crafted an oak button in the crafting grid. I will move it to a free slot in my inventory (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
